title: Looking for Bronze/Silver ADC
body:
Looking for a solid ADC main (bronze/silver) to climb with next season (around november/december, school holidays).
I mainly play Thresh support, but I can be flexible.
Support/JG main.
Add me in game and we'll see how we go! :).

Also, you don't need to be exceptional or anything, just don't flame please ^w^.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
hey add me, mainly play adc but otherwise happy to q :)
PatrikkStar

Add me
IGN: LilMil
ADC  Main :)
